verses.verse: And there was a man <S%H376><s%> of mount <S%H2022><s%> Efrayim <S%H669><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Mikhah <S%H4321><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his mother <S%H517><s%>, The eleven hundred <S%H505><s%> <S%H3967><s%> shekels of silver <S%H3701><s%> that were taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8795><s%> from thee, about which thou cursedst <S%H422><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and spakest <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of also in mine ears <S%H241><s%>, behold, the silver <S%H3701><s%> is with me; I took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it. And his mother <S%H517><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be thou of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, my son <S%H1121><s%>.

And when he had restored <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the eleven hundred <S%H505><s%> <S%H3967><s%> shekels of silver <S%H3701><s%> to his mother <S%H517><s%>, his mother <S%H517><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I had wholly <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8687><s%> dedicated <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> from my hand <S%H3027><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%>, to make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> a graven image <S%H6459><s%> and a molten image <S%H4541><s%>: now therefore I will restore <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it unto thee.

Yet he restored <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the money <S%H3701><s%> unto his mother <S%H517><s%>; and his mother <S%H517><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them to the founder <S%H6884><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, who made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thereof a graven image <S%H6459><s%> and a molten image <S%H4541><s%>: and they were in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Mikhah <S%H4321><s%>.

And the man <S%H376><s%> Mikhah <S%H4318><s%> had an house <S%H1004><s%> of 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, and made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an ephod <S%H646><s%>, and teraphim <S%H8655><s%>, and consecrated <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8762><s%> <S%H3027><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%>, who became his Kohen <S%H3548><s%>.

In those days <S%H3117><s%> there was no king <S%H4428><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, but every man <S%H376><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that which was right <S%H3477><s%> in his own eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

And there was a young man <S%H5288><s%> out of Beit-Lechemjudah <S%H1035><s%> <S%H3063><s%> of the family <S%H4940><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, who was a Levi <S%H3881><s%>, and he sojourned <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8804><s%> there.

And the man <S%H376><s%> departed <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%> from Beit-Lechemjudah <S%H1035><s%> <S%H3063><s%> to sojourn <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8800><s%> where he could find <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a place: and he came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to mount <S%H2022><s%> Efrayim <S%H669><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Mikhah <S%H4318><s%>, as he journeyed <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> <S%H1870><s%>.

And Mikhah <S%H4318><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Whence <S%H370><s%> comest <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thou? And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, I am a Levi <S%H3881><s%> of Beit-Lechemjudah <S%H1035><s%> <S%H3063><s%>, and I go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to sojourn <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8800><s%> where I may find <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a place.

And Mikhah <S%H4318><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8798><s%> with me, and be unto me a father <S%H1><s%> and a Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, and I will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee ten <S%H6235><s%> shekels of silver <S%H3701><s%> by the year <S%H3117><s%>, and a suit <S%H6187><s%> of apparel <S%H899><s%>, and thy victuals <S%H4241><s%>. So the Levi <S%H3881><s%> went in <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And the Levi <S%H3881><s%> was content <S%H2974><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> with the man <S%H376><s%>; and the young man <S%H5288><s%> was unto him as one <S%H259><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%>.

And Mikhah <S%H4318><s%> consecrated <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8762><s%> <S%H3027><s%> the Levi <S%H3881><s%>; and the young man <S%H5288><s%> became his Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, and was in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Mikhah <S%H4318><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Mikhah <S%H4318><s%>, Now know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> I that the YY <S%H3068><s%> will do me good <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, seeing I have a Levi <S%H3881><s%> to my Kohen <S%H3548><s%>.
